meanings.definition: Having a lot of courage or determination.
meanings.sent1: The guttier knight bravely faced the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She felt guttier than ever before as she stood up to the bully.
meanings.sent3: The guttier squirrel fearlessly chased away the bigger animals.
meanings.sent4: Her guttier spirit shone brightly in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The guttier firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.definition: A person who has a lot of courage or determination.
meanings.sent1: The guttier was honored for their bravery in the rescue mission.
meanings.sent2: She admired the guttier for their fearless attitude in every challenge.
meanings.sent3: The guttier's courage inspired others to be brave in difficult times.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the guttier of the group for his unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The guttier's actions spoke louder than words, showing true bravery.
